Desc.entry: Lucy Wallace provides tuition in cello, piano and theory. All ages and abilities welcome, helping pupils through graded exams or teaching simply for enjoyment. Lessons can be arranged during the day or in the evening. Has 8 years music teaching experience, both privately and for music services within schools, as well as working as a classroom assistant at both primary and secondary school level. Qualifications - BMus (Hons), ABRSM Grade 8 Cello, ABRSM Grade 8 Piano.
